comments:
Eclipse 3.3M3: Help > Software Updates > Find and Install > Search for new features. Select Mylar for 3.3 site (http://download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/e3.3). Click Finish. I got this exception once but couldn't reproduce it:

eclipse.buildId=I20061102-1715
java.version=1.6.0-rc
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -keyring c:\keyring
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -data C:\Development\sas\workspace -keyring c:\keyring

Error
Fri Dec 08 08:38:10 EST 2006
An internal error occurred during: "Update Manager".

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0
at org.eclipse.update.internal.search.SiteSearchCategory$Query.run(SiteSearchCategory.java:118)
at org.eclipse.update.search.UpdateSearchRequest.searchOneSite(UpdateSearchRequest.java:502)
at org.eclipse.update.search.UpdateSearchRequest.performSearch(UpdateSearchRequest.java:318)
at org.eclipse.update.ui.UpdateJob.runSearchForNew(UpdateJob.java:182)
at org.eclipse.update.ui.UpdateJob.run(UpdateJob.java:170)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
